about.heading: ABOUT US
paragraphs: Hello, Iâ€™m Sophie! Sunday Dozen began in my home kitchen after I realized how hard it was to find gluten-free treats that truly taste just as good as the originals. After extensive recipe testing and experimenting, I found myself with a gluten-free cookie that was too good not to share.

I bake in small batches using high-quality, gluten-free ingredients, and focus on rich flavors and bakery level quality. My kitchen is 100% free of gluten, making every cookie safe to consume for those with celiac disease. Each and every box is made with care, and I absolutely love being able to provide delicious, safe desserts for everyone to enjoy.

steps.title: Fill out Order Form
steps.body: Fill out the online order form with your cookie choices and contact info. The form opens weekly on Sundays and closes once we reach capacity.

steps.title: submit payment
steps.body: Confirm your order by sending your payment via Venmo. You will receive a text to confirm your payment and order.

steps.title: pick up your order
steps.body: Enjoy your cookies on pickup day! Pickup information can be found in the order form or your confirmation text.

note.text: To request delivery or place a custom order, please send us a message.

items.question: Are your cookies celiac safe?
items.answer: Yes! My cookies are safe for those with celiac disease. The kitchen I work in is 100% free of gluten, so cross contamination is not a risk.

items.question: Do you deliver?
items.answer: Yes! I can deliver within Ann Arbor, MI for a $5 delivery fee. I most commonly deliver on the University of Michigan campus, but can deliver anywhere with an Ann Arbor address.

items.question: Do you take bulk orders?
items.answer: Yes! I am more than happy to take orders for corporate events, bridal/baby showers, weddings, and more. If you are looking to place a bulk order, please send us a message. If you place a bulk order and live outside of Ann Arbor, MI, we can discuss the possibility of delivery or different pickup options.

items.question: Do you make cakes or cupcakes?
items.answer: At this time, no I do not. I only make cookies at the moment but I am hoping to expand into more baked goods in the future!
